Content:
Hi guys, my 2015 cb125f 22000 miles makes a racket, sound clip attached.
Bike was noisy when I bought it, removed valve cover, one of the roller cam followers had destroyed its needles, I replaced rockers & camshaft including new o ring, drained old oil. Started 1st kick. Still noisy. Any ideas
I have removed barrel & piston to check big end vertical movement, no discernable movement, small end seems ok. I'm stumped what to do next.
Wondering about oil pump, it does work but how well ?
Audio file
Title: Clattery sounding honda cb125f
Author: Jazzman49
